name: Spicy Salmon Stew
author: deven
summary: A spicy hearty stew full of salmon, rice, and vegetables. We make this meal at least three times a month. It has been a family favorite since we left Toronto.
ingredients: 2 cups frozen country-style shredded hash brown potatoes
directions: Bring water to a boil in a large stockpot
Add chicken bouillon cubes and let dissolve
Heat oil in a frying pan over medium-high heat
Season salmon with some of the pepper, paprika, and salt
Add salmon and garlic to the pan and cook until fish can be flaked with a fork but is still tender, 3 to 5 minutes per side
Break salmon apart into small chunks; transfer to the broth along with the garlic
Stir rice, mixed vegetables, and broccoli into the broth
Add onion powder, garlic powder, and remaining pepper, paprika, and salt
Stir well and cook until vegetables are slightly tender, about 15 minutes
Add potatoes and simmer until heated through, about 15 minutes more
